package.name: Simple Start Menu Launcher
package.description: A simple start menu launcher. Code example. Recommended size 50x50 px

settings: If set to 1, color settings below will be ignored and text's color will be used instead. [0/1]
Color of the icon - R in RGB. [0-255]
Color of the icon - G in RGB. [0-255]
Color of the icon - B in RGB. [0-255]

Should be transparent. Start with / if absolute path or with . if relative.
For example: /C:/file.png, ./icon.png
